summary: Completed comprehensive testing of file upload implementation. Frontend UI successfully replaced URL inputs with file inputs for Cover Image and Gallery Images. All admin form elements working correctly with proper file validation. API endpoints experiencing 520 server errors preventing full backend testing.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 server error instead of JSON response
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents admin authentication and access to file upload functionality
critical_bugs.root_cause: ADMIN_PASSWORD environment variable was not set, now configured but still having server issues

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 server error for FormData file uploads
critical_bugs.note: API route code looks correct, appears to be server/environment issue

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 server error for FormData requests

critical_bugs.impact: Cannot test storage file cleanup on deletion

passed_tests: Admin page correctly redirects to login when not authenticated
Admin authentication working with manually set cookie
Admin dashboard loads with 'Add New Project' button (data-testid='add-project-btn')
Project form appears when 'Add New Project' button is clicked
Cover Image input correctly configured as file type with accept='image/jpeg,image/png,image/webp'
Gallery Images input correctly configured as file type with multiple selection and accept='image/jpeg,image/png,image/webp'
No URL text inputs found in admin form - correctly replaced with file inputs
All form elements present: Project Name, Category, Location, Year, Area, Client Name, Summary, Story, Scope, Materials, Featured checkbox, Submit button
Projects page loads correctly with filter buttons and search input
Projects page shows empty state when no projects exist
Project detail page shows 'Not Found' for non-existent slugs with proper back button
Admin form validation appears to work (cover image required message shown)
Projects list container present in admin dashboard
Form data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing automation
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: API endpoints are returning 520 server errors preventing full testing. The ADMIN_PASSWORD environment variable has been configured, but server issues remain. Need to investigate and fix the 520 server errors affecting all /api/admin/* endpoints. The frontend file upload UI implementation is perfect and ready to use once backend issues are resolved.
